text: "Stay" is a song by Australian rapper and singer The Kid Laroi and Canadian singer Justin Bieber. It was released on July 9, 2021, through Columbia Records. The two artists share the same manager, Scooter Braun. Laroi and Bieber wrote the song with Subhhaan Rahmaan, Magnus Hoiberg, Michael Mule, Omer Fedi, Blake Slatkin, and Charlie Puth. Puth, Fedi, Slatkin, and Cashmere Cat produced the song. After entering the Billboard Hot 100 at number three, it later peaked at number one, becoming Laroi's first US number-one and Bieber's eighth. ==References== Category:Pop songs Category:2021 songs Category:Justin Bieber songs
title: Stay (The Kid Laroi and Justin Bieber song)
